INSERT INTO TBL_INTEREST VALUES(#{interestId}, #{interestType}, #{memberId})
mapper.select: SELECT TBI.ID AS interestId, TBI.INTEREST_TYPE AS interestType, TBI.MEMBER_ID AS memberId, TBID.INTEREST_DETAIL_SECTION AS interestDetailSection, TBID.INTEREST_DETAIL_VALUE AS interestDetailValue FROM TBL_INTEREST TBI LEFT JOIN TBL_INTEREST_DETAIL TBID ON TBI.ID = TBID.INTEREST_ID WHERE TBI.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TBL_INTEREST_DETAIL WHERE INTEREST_ID IN(SELECT ID FROM TBL_INTEREST WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId})
